title: Recent advances in zinc-ion dehydration strategies for optimized Znâ€“metal batteries
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00343H, Review Article
Haoyu Li, Sijie Li, Ruilin Hou, Yuan Rao, Shaohua Guo, Zhi Chang, Haoshen Zhou
